name: Pokémon Y
overview: Become a Pokémon Trainer and set out for adventure in a vast and wondrous new region filled with new Pokémon to catch, trade, and battle. Your adventure in Pokémon Y takes place in the Kalos region, home to beautiful skies and forests! The Kalos region is full of interesting places to visit and explore! All-new Pokémon and past favorites come to life with detailed graphics and intense 3D battles and in the new Pokémon-Amie mode you can pet, feed, and play with your Pokémon to form a deeper bond, which may benefit you in future battles.
